Way to make Birria

How Does It Work ?

You'll need

1

Birria Bomb

+

2-3LBS

Beef Chuck Roast

+

4

Cups of water

=

Birria!

A cooker of your choice

Stovetop

Set to a medium flame and let it simmer for 3 hours.

Pressure Cooker

Set timer on high for 1 hour and 45 minutes.

Slow Cooker

Choose the low setting and cook for 8 hours. if youâ€™re short on time, opt for the high setting and cook for 6 hours.
